awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: Continuing the story of Aurora Greenway in her latter years. After the death of her daughter, Aurora struggled to keep her family together, but has one grandson in jail, a rebellious granddaughter, and another grandson living just above the poverty line.

title: The Evening Star
